content.text: Change Availability of Abandoned Power Armor
content.help: Removes or changes the full sets placed in the world by most power armor mods

content.text: Brotherhood of Steel
Chance that power armored Knights will wear T-60 (or T-45/T-51 with BPAO)
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Knights will wear other power armor sets, such as X-02, if available

content.text: Chance that power armored Paladins will wear T-60
content.help: The lower the value, the more likely Paladins will wear other power armor sets, such as T-65, if available

content.text: Raiders
Chance to get rare power armor sets
content.help: The chance that raiders will get rare power armor sets, like full rusted sets of T-45 or Excavator raider sets

content.text: Chance to get rare rusted power armor pieces
content.help: The chance that rusted mixed sets will contain rare power armor pieces like X-01

content.text: Make T-60 available to raiders
content.help: Some Assembly Required makes T-60 exclusive to the Brotherhood of Steel, if you want that consistency

content.text: Gunners
Make T-60 available to Gunners
content.help: Some Assembly Required makes T-60 exclusive to the Brotherhood of Steel, if you want that consistency

content.text: Legendary Power Armor
Legendary Power Armor Drop Chance
content.help: The chance that legendary power armor drops instead of legendary armor. At 100%, no legendary armor will ever drop.

content.text: Power Armored Enemy Legendary Equipment Chance
content.help: The chance that normal power armored enemies will have a single piece of legendary power armor equipped

content.text: Legendary Power Armored Enemy Legendary Equipment Chance
content.help: The chance that legendary power armored enemies will have a single piece of legendary power armor equipped

content.text: These settings make changes based on other mods you may be using. They should be toggled ON only if you have the mod the setting is designed to go with.
Brotherhood Power Armor Overhaul OR AWKCR
Make X-01 available to Brotherhood of Steel Paladins
content.help: These mods provide a Paladin paint job for X-01, so it can be give to the Brotherhood of Steel

content.text: Consistent Power Armor Overhaul
Make T-51 available to raiders
content.help: T-51 doesn't have a rusty texture by default, but CPAO adds one which makes it fit in with the Raiders' equipment

content.text: X02 Raider Power Armor
Make X-02 (Creation Club) available to raiders
content.help: This mod replaces the standard X-02 set with a raider set, so this removes it from the Gunners and adds it to Raiders
